sect2.title: Installing Needed Modules
sect2.para: Gnomesword is ideally suited for studying the original Greek and Hebrew texts. To get started, you will want the following modules:

listitem.para: StrongsHebrew Dictionary (or get StrongsRealHebrew from the Kleinpaste Repository)
StrongsGreek Dictionary (or get StrongsRealGreek from the Kleinpaste Repository)
StrongsRealGreek Dictionary (same as StrongsGreek, but with Greek characters, B-Greek transliteration, and self-referencing links)
StrongsRealHebrew Dictionary (same as StrongsHebrew, but with Hebrew characters and self-referencing links)
InvertedStrongsRealGreek (key in or copy actual Greek word, rather than number)
